extension.summary: Catch-Up TV & More : Replay TV et bien plus encore.
extension.description: Catch-Up TV & More regroupe dans un même plugin Kodi l'ensemble des vidéos des différents services et chaînes de Replay TV (rattrapage TV). De plus, cette extension vous permet d'accéder rapidement aux vidéos et contenus proposés par certains sites internet.
extension.disclaimer: Retours de bugs, propositions d'améliorations ou d'ajout de contenus sont les bienvenue ! GitHub ou e-mail.
extension.summary: Catch-Up TV & More: It's all in the title.
extension.description: Catch-Up TV & More brings together in one Kodi plugin all the videos of the various services and channels of catch-up TV. Furthermore, this addon allows you to quickly access the videos and content offered by certain websites.
extension.disclaimer: Bug reports, suggestions for improvements or content additions are welcome! GitHub or e-mail.

extension.summary: Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.

extension.summary: Watch All Episodes And Movies For All That Is Power Rangers
extension.description: A closeknit band of teenagers in fictional Angel Grove, Calif., transforms into a uniformed team of superheroes ready to take on any villains. Their primary focus is Rita Repulsa, a space villainess captured long ago by the wise sage Zordon and inadvertently freed by astronauts. Zordon recruits the teens to help him recapture Rita, and later to battle against Lord Zedd, Rito Revolto, and Master Vile

addon.name: [COLOR purple]Wraith[/COLOR]
addon.provider-name: Revived by [COLOR purple]Mr.Blamo[/COLOR], original work by phil65

extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses Wraith for playback and library functions.

Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheden om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt Wraith voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: 1.0.59: 29th May 2017 - 'Now playing' text now defined by SF due to skin variations

extension.summary: TMDb, TVDb, Trakt, AudioDb and LastFM browser
extension.description: Browse The MovieDb, The TVDb, Trakt, The AudioDb and LastFM and pass info along to library or an addon to try and play it. Needs player-files and the appropriate addon to actually play.
extension.summary: Blader door TMDb, TVDb, Trakt, AudioDb en LastFM
extension.description: Blader door The MovieDb, The TVDb, Trakt, The AudioDb en LastFM en geef info door aan de bibliotheek of een addon om te proberen het af te spelen. Vereist player-bestanden en de bijbehorende addon om daadwerkelijk af te kunnen spelen.

extension.summary: Collection of modules used by Mucky Ducks Addons
extension.description: Collection of modules used by Mucky Ducks Addons beautifulsoup3 v3.2.1 from https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup : beautifulsoup4 v4.5.1 from https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup : cfscrape 1.6.8 from https://github.com/Anorov/cloudflare-scrape : incapsula-cracker v0.1.3 from https://github.com/ziplokk1/incapsula-cracker : Js2Py v0.40 from https://github.com/PiotrDabkowski/Js2Py : jsbeautifier v1.6.4 from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/jsbeautifier : jsunfuck from tknorrois s.a.l.t.s modules: jsunpack from urlresolver which is a modified script from jsbeautifier: md_request a simple script for making web requests : md_tools a script with common methods in the Mucky Duck addons : md_view a simple script for adding views to addons : requests v2.12.4 from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests : six v1.10.0 from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/six : unshortenit v0.3.0 from https://github.com/jkehler/unshortenit :
